title: Our solar system: the outer planets
brief_description: One of a two tape set aimed at children that takes a fun and informative voyage to each planet in our solar system. Interesting facts about each planet are presented, such as size, composition, relative position in the solar system, gravity and temperature. A combination of video footage, photographs and animation are used to present an authentic picture of each planet. ‘The outer planets’ investigates Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus, Neptune and some of their moons including Io, Titan, Miranda and Triton. Pluto, the most outer planet is also visited. See also ‘The Inner planets.’
